mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class ( business_id, category_id, title, description, description2, duration, discount_price, instructor_name, difficulty, curriculum, host_introduction, thumbnail_image, detail_images, instructor_image_url, address, region, class_type, created_at, price, discount ) VALUES ( #{businessId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{description2}, #{duration}, #{discountPrice}, #{instructorName}, #{difficulty}, #{curriculum}, #{hostIntroduction}, #{thumbnailImages}, #{detailImages}, #{instructorImageUrl}, #{address}, #{region}, #{classType}, #{createdAt}, #{price}, #{discount} )
mapper.update: update class set url = #{url} where class_id = #{classId}
mapper.select: SELECT class_id, business_id, category_id, title, thumbnail_image, c.price, discount_price, region, open_id FROM class c left join (select max(open_id) open_id, master_id from class_open group by master_id) o on c.class_id = o.master_id ORDER BY class_id DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT class_id, title, url FROM class

SELECT class_id, business_id, category_id, title, description, description2, duration, created_at, instructor_name,difficulty, detail_images, thumbnail_image, address, region,price, url, class_type, discount, discount_price, curriculum, host_introduction,instructor_image_url FROM class ORDER BY class_id DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT c.class_id, c.business_id, c.category_id, c.title, c.description, c.duration, c.curriculum, c.price, c.discount_price, c.thumbnail_image, c.address, o.open_id, o.min_participants, o.max_participants, o.status FROM class c JOIN class_open o ON c.class_id = o.master_id WHERE c.class_id = #{classId} AND o.open_id = #{openId}
